LanguageData.PTBattleTrance.label: Battle Trance
LanguageData.PTBattleTrance.description: A state of heightened battlefield awareness, induced by a psion.
LanguageData.PTBattlefieldAwakening.label: Battlefield Awakening
LanguageData.PTBattlefieldAwakening.description: A state of absolute battlefield awareness, induced by a psion.
LanguageData.PTMeleeMastery.label: Melee Mastery
LanguageData.PTMeleeMastery.description: A state of advance melee combat ability, induced by a psion.
LanguageData.PTRangedMastery.label: Ranged Mastery
LanguageData.PTRangedMastery.description: A state of advance ranged combat ability, induced by a psion.
LanguageData.PTPsychicSuppression.label: Psychically Suppressed
LanguageData.PTPsychicSuppression.description: A state of decreased psychic sensitivity, induced by a psion.
LanguageData.PTPsychicSilence.label: Psychically Silenced
LanguageData.PTPsychicSilence.description: A state of massively decreased psychic sensitivity, induced by a psion.
LanguageData.PTPsychicDamage.label: Psychic damage
LanguageData.PTPsychicDamage.description: An injury caused by concentrated psychic energy.\n\nPsychic injuries take a variety of horrifying forms that are generally very painful. Often, the effects are as much psychosomatic as physical, resulting in far greater pain than one would expect for the damage caused.
